website_summaries.verdict: These single-use insoles get all the way up to 95 degrees and fit well in both shoes and boots.
pros: Warmer heats up in 15 to 30 minutes
Fits well in both shoes and boots
cons: May not last a full 5 hours

customer_reviews.title: These are the very best chemical toe warmers
customer_reviews.text: As a chronic sufferer of popsicle toes, I rely on Grabbers to keep my toes warm, and me happy, on my winter bike rides. Cheaper warmers exist, but I prefer these. The backing peels off easily (important when your fingers are stiff from cold), they heat up quickly, and they last for hours. If you need more heat than wools socks will ever provide, get Grabbers. Happy feet, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for me!
customer_reviews.text: I agree that this "new" foot warmer isn't as potent as previous versions, but they still keep my feet warm for over 5 hours. The foot warmers don't come out of the package as "hot" as they used to - I wish they would - but they still keep my feet warm enough through the day. I work in an office, but its very drafty and constantly cold in the winter. Its frustrating to work in such an office where its so darned cold, but I get some relief with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mavis

customer_reviews.title: They work but don't last long
customer_reviews.text: The hourly rating on the package overstates the effective life of this product. That said, they do take the edge off when ice fishing and I don't regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Generally Balanced POV

customer_reviews.title: Comfort worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in shoes or boots. Keeps feet warm while riding horses or working on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny

customer_reviews.title: Stay warm for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very flat so they fit in just about any shoe/boot, and stays warm for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: These warmers are perfect for my medical need after surgery to keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: These warmers are perfect for my medical need after surgery to keep my foot warm for circulation. They stay warm for a good part of the day and fit nicely in boots or shoes. Will continue to purchase them as I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Warm Thought
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years. I do wish they came in Small, Medium, Large and Extra Large though so they fit your shoe size a little better. I wear a size US 6.5 shoe and the M/L is too large, but the S/M is a little small. It would be great if they had children's sizes as well! I bought the M/L for my son that has many out door hobbies and he loves them! They just keep away the chill, even in Georgia!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Harrison

customer_reviews.title: They work very well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these for years in my shoes. I have very cold feet almost all year. These are great in the cold outdoors or on cold concrete floors. Last me about all day. These do not have an adhesive and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: N Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Useful, allows me to spend longer time in the nature I love. Caution: do not put these in your boots and wait a few minutes. They will puff up. Just slip them in right before your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: They arrived, hard as a rock. I know from past experience that, (A) the charcoal inside is supposed to be soft and supple; (B) the heat activation will not work when it is hard. I was fortunate to be able to return the box of 30 that I bought. In the future, I will buy locally so I can determine the age of the foot warmer. Old and ineffective are hard. New and worthwhile, are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: acckk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No photos of individual products. -- also -- individual packets of footwarmers are different from that pictured. New product design (white thicker w/ slick backing) and new packaging. Very unhappy. Slippery underside w/ no adhesive -- just works its way out of the shoe. Worthless unless you are sitting still in a class/movie/ etc. Walking about -- footwarmer just works its way out of the shoe. Why change a good design??? I have been buying these things in bulk for years..... and rely on them to get thru cold and chilly months. So it's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a yearly purchase for my wife for use during the North East winters. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: NixImages

customer_reviews.title: I wear these along with toe warmers and they keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these along with toe warmers and they keep my feet toasty which allows me to ride my horse without being uncomfortable because we ride in 16 degree weather quite often.
customer_reviews.author: sariego

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous version
customer_reviews.text: Grabber has changed something about these warmers, and they don't heat up as fast nor ever reach as high a temperature. Beware any of these insoles with French labeling and a white, instead of tan, fabric backing. If you can find the old version with the tan fabric, buy them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet while snow-biking
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't bike in the winter without these. They only keep my feet warm for ~ 2 hours, but that's usually enough to last my entire ride at 0 - 10 degrees F. I have noticed that they are still warm in my boots for much longer, however. I keep them in my car and in my plane for winter trips.
customer_reviews.author: trehgr

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet
customer_reviews.text: Loves these for skiing. Keep my feet warm. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT when combined with the Toe Warmers
customer_reviews.text: I used these foot warmers by them selves at my daughters ball game and my toes still got pretty cold, but when I combined them with the toe warmers it was awesome. Kept my feet warm for 5 hours during the Cold MN Spring College Softball games.
customer_reviews.author: AndoverRed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spring may be a little late this year - these help!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Adams

customer_reviews.title: Foot Warmers
customer_reviews.text: I have a medical condition that causes my feet to be very cold year round. I could not live without the foot warmers. However they get too hot and I have to take them out of my shoes when they get too hot. Otherwise I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: jane h hanckel

customer_reviews.title: life savers!
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully! My feet are always cold in the winter, even with heavy socks, but these keep my feet warm no matter what the weather is or where I am! And they are very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley W. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to use while skiing this season in the Northeast where temps drop considerably. They claim they actually keep their feet hot!
customer_reviews.author: STK

customer_reviews.title: Very warm for about two hours
customer_reviews.text: These do not last 5+ hours, but they are very good for about 2, maybe 2.5 hours. My whole family used them skiing this year and made a big difference when temperatures were close to zero.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Feet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't las as long as the 9 hour but still good.
customer_reviews.author: mollie

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: great for popping into ski boots to add a little extra warmth and keep feet warm. (they do not heat feet up..only keep your own feet from getting cold)...I ski from 8am to 4pm and theyre still warm when I take them out at the end of the day.....well worth the money to save having freezing tootsies!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product and deal
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for skiing for many years. Started to use them for those cold mornings playing golf and they work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lousy Phone

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow sports!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid snowboarder in the Northeast, my feet were always cold on the slopes. Now I just pop a pair in my snowboard boots and keep going when other people have to take a break to warm up in the lodge. I don't even feel them in my boots. Even though I could probably use the large size, the small/medium works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweet

product_meta.title: Grabber Insole Foot Warmers - Long Lasting Safe Natural Odorless Air Activated Warmers - Up to 5 Hours of Heat - 30 Pair - Small/Medium
product_meta.description: A whole new level of foot care. The exclusive technology - from a thin, flexible construction to the insole-shaped design - redefines the air-activated warmer. Put the Heat Treat foot warmers in shoes or boots for 5+ hours of soothing heat. Packaged as a pair. No. CSFWSM12: Small/medium - men's shoe size 4 to 7, women's shoe size 5 to 8 No. CSFWML12: Medium/large - men's shoe size 8 and above, women's shoe size 9 and above
feature_bullets: SAFE, NATURAL LONG-LASTING HEAT - Odorless, Disposable, Single-Use Item, Do Not Apply Directly to The Skin. TSA Approved. Made in the USA using domestic and imported materials.

TO ACTIVATE - Remove warmer from outer package. Warmer heats up in 15-30 minutes. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air and shake. After use, dispose with regular garbage. Ingredients will not harm the environment.

MULTIPURPOSE WARMERS - Single use air-activated heat packs that provide everyday warmth and are ideal for keeping your body warm when the temperature gets cold. They’re available in several styles designed for your hands, feet, and body.

QUAILTY - To ensure you receive genuine Grabber products when shopping online, please only purchase from authorized distributors or retailers or an Amazon listing that clearly states the product is sold and shipped directly by Amazon. com.
WHEN TO USE: Tailgating at Events, Outdoor Sporting Events, Hunting & Fishing, Camping & Hiking, Working in The Yard, Jogging or Taking Your Pet for A Walk. Convenient, Compact, Portable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
